lexUnit.name: keep.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: cause to continue in a specificied state or process

sentence.text: All IBM Corp needs to do to return to profit is get rid of excess staff and keep exploiting customers that are n't in the know by selling mainframes and related software at exorbitantly high margins .
I 'll keep away while deer are culled -- for the sake of the deer .
` When I fell off I just kept thinking this is it , this is it .
` Well , could n't we sort of jump around a bit to keep warm ? " said Masklin desperately .
And there 's also other famous cases to keep them going â€¦
No cos you keep shouting at me .
From Sweet Nothin 's and All Alone Am I to I 'm Sorry they just kept coming on Saturday night .
He held his spear gun out in front of him with the safety off and used his flippers to keep facing the fish .
Terry kept badgering the guards for magazines and a radio .
Taylor had been an amateur boxer and Jim of course was a former American football player and was a big man , and he and Taylor kept threatening to settle their disputes with their fists .
Needless to say , Jeremy has to keep returning to the darkroom for more film throughout the game .
I get a tremendous kick from the creative aspect of life , and I think it is this that keeps me so well and full of vitality . "
How the hell do you keep so slim .
Stella kept her arm in the air , waving , waving long after O'Hara had swerved the motorcycle round the corner .
But at least the new developments should ease the diplomatic impasse that has kept relations between Japan and the Soviet Union frozen for 46 years .
JACKO kept fuming police waiting for nearly an hour as he went on a midnight shopping spree -- for new toys .
She had defined what she perceived to be reality , and she kept trying to rub Scarlet 's nose in it .
` Moira kept telling Jett that he should n't be having to do so much touring , that he should be concentrating on short tours of big venues like Wembley and the NEC .
Shareholders , who know they will get peanuts if the firm is wound up , want the firm to keep trading in the hope that it will come good .
I 'll keep trying .
